neural_astar.classic_astar module¶

class neural_astar.classic_astar.Astar(heuristic: Callable[[Node2d, Node2d], float], costmap_weight: int = 1, max_iterations: int = 50000000, heuristic_weight: int = 5)¶

Bases: LightningDataModule

forward(matrix_batch: Tensor, start_batch: Tensor, goal_batch: Tensor, costmap_batch: Tensor | None = None) → Tuple[Tensor, Tensor]¶

Forward pass for A* algorithm.

Parameters:

  • matrix_batch (torch.Tensor) – Batch of input matrices.

  • start_batch (torch.Tensor) – Batch of start nodes.

  • goal_batch (torch.Tensor) – Batch of goal nodes.

  • costmap_batch (torch.Tensor, optional) – Batch of costmap matrices (optional).

Returns:

Tuple of paths and visited nodes.

Return type:

Tuple[torch.Tensor, torch.Tensor]

neural_astar.custom_types module¶

class neural_astar.custom_types.ClassicAstarNode(node, parent, h, g, cost)¶

Bases: tuple

A node representation used in the Classic A* algorithm.

Attributes:

node (Node2d): The current 2D node. parent (Node2d): The parent node in the path. h (float): The heuristic cost from the current node to the goal. g (float): The cost from the start node to the current node. cost (float): The total cost (g + h) for the current node.

cost¶

Alias for field number 4

g¶

Alias for field number 3

h¶

Alias for field number 2

node¶

Alias for field number 0

parent¶

Alias for field number 1

neural_astar.dataset_utils.generate_random_points(matrix: Tensor, seed: int = None) → Tuple[Node2d, Node2d]¶

Generate random start and goal points on an empty matrix.

Parameters:

  • matrix (torch.Tensor) – The binary matrix representing the environment.

  • seed (int, optional) – The random seed for reproducibility (default is None).

Returns:

A tuple containing the start and goal points.

Tuple[Node2d, Node2d]

class neural_astar.differentiable_astar.DifferentiableAstar(max_iterations: int = 50000, costmap_weight: int = 1)¶

Bases: LightningModule

forward(matrix_batch: Tensor, start_batch: Tensor, goal_batch: Tensor, costmap_batch: Tensor) → Tuple[Tensor, Tensor]¶

Forward pass of the DifferentiableAstar model.

Parameters:

  • matrix_batch (torch.Tensor) – The tensor representing the environment matrix.

  • start_batch (torch.Tensor) – The tensor representing start nodes.

  • goal_batch (torch.Tensor) – The tensor representing goal nodes.

  • costmap_batch (torch.Tensor) – The tensor representing the costmap.

Returns:

Tensors representing paths and closed lists.

Return type:

Tuple[torch.Tensor, torch.Tensor]

neural_astar.display module¶

class neural_astar.display.Displayer¶

Bases: object

Class for displaying matrices with various components highlighted.

Attributes:

matrix_ (Optional[np.ndarray]): The matrix to be displayed. cost_matrix_ (Optional[np.ndarray]): The cost matrix for additional information. has_cost_ (bool): Flag indicating if a cost matrix is available. plot_ready_ (bool): Flag indicating if the plot is ready for display. plot_ (Optional[Tuple[plt.Figure, plt.Axes]]): The plot figure and axes. plot_title_ (Optional[str]): The title for the plot.

neural_astar.neural_astar module¶

class neural_astar.neural_astar.NeuralAstar(classic_astar: Astar, differentiable_astar: DifferentiableAstar, encoder: AstarEncoder, use_start_goal_data: bool)¶

Bases: LightningModule

Neural network model incorporating both classic A* and differentiable A*.

Attributes:

classic_astar_ (Astar): Classic A* algorithm. differentiable_astar_ (DifferentiableAstar): Differentiable A* algorithm. encoder_ (AstarEncoder): A* encoder. use_start_goal_data_ (bool): Flag indicating whether to use start and goal data for training

forward(matrix_batch, start_batch, goal_batch, use_classic_astar=False)¶

Forward pass through the NeuralAstar model.

Args:

matrix_batch: Batch of matrices. start_batch: Batch of start points. goal_batch: Batch of goal points. use_classic_astar (bool): Flag indicating whether to use classic A*.

Returns:

tuple: Tuple containing paths_batch and visited_nodes_batch.

neural_astar.training_module module¶

class neural_astar.training_module.NeuralAstarTrainingModule(neural_astar, learning_rate=0.01)¶

Bases: LightningModule

Training module for Neural A* model.

Attributes:

neural_astar_ (NeuralAstar): Neural A* model. learning_rate_ (float): Learning rate for optimization.

configure_optimizers() → Optimizer¶

Configure the optimizer for training.

Returns:

torch.optim.Optimizer: Optimizer for training.

forward(matrix_batch, start_batch, goal_batch)¶

Forward pass through the NeuralAstar model.

Args:

matrix_batch: Batch of matrices. start_batch: Batch of start points. goal_batch: Batch of goal points.

Returns:

torch.Tensor: Batch of searched nodes.

training_step(train_batch, batch_idx)¶

Training step for the NeuralAstar model.

Args:

train_batch: Batch of training data. batch_idx: Index of the batch.

Returns:

torch.Tensor: Loss for the training step.
